item.title: Ham Radio in WSL
item.description:
I am trying to run my ham radio programs in WSL - there isn't a good SDR receiver software for Windows that will interface via audio with "soundcard" mode software, such as the WSJT-X.

So, I'm running my shack on an old (circa 2010-2012) gaming PC that is stuck on Windows â€¦
item.dc:creator: eheisman
